price: 67. Nde topesaki bango litomba ya monene kowuta epai na biso,
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
